title: Issa Rae Married, Kanye New Album, Nick Cannon K Hart Pranks, James Brown and more.
itunes:title: Issa Rae Married, Kanye New Album, Nick Cannon K Hart Pranks, James Brown and more.
description:
Good morning and welcome to the ride! They just might be trippin' today. The CLO got a Koala Bear issue on the table today. Kanye set new streaming records. The crew share their experiences with the vaccine and how it has put the mind at ease. Nick Cannon and Kevin Hart are going at it with these pranks. Steve is here talkin' 'bout the Olympics the way you need to hear about it! Big Dog and Tommy have Olympic event ideas that they for sure could get the gold in. The estate of The Godfather of Soul has been settled amongst his heirs except the ex-wife. Today the show wraps up with the crew sharing stories about their favorite nieces and nephews.

Learn more about your ad-choices at https://www.iheartpodcastnetwork.com

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
content:encoded:
